org.stekikun.dolmen.automaton

Class NFA

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.stekikun.dolmen.automaton.NFA

  • public class NFA
extends Object
    Describes a tagged Non-deterministic Finite Automaton recognizing the language of some given tagged regular expression. In particular, each transition is decorated with the set of tags that must be updated when following this transition.
    Author:
    St√©phane Lescuyer

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  NFA.Event
      Each transition in the NFA is based on an event, which is either of the following: a character is read from the character set whose index in the character set dictionary is NFA.Event.n a final state is reached and the semantic action whose index is NFA.Event.n must be performed
      static class  NFA.EventKind
      The kinds of events that decorate transitions in the automaton
      static class  NFA.Transition
      A transition in the NFA is an event decorated with a set of tags.
